alert.note: Alert for Lincoln County; Sheep Range; Spring Mountains-Red Rock Canyon (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 28 at 9:47PM PST until December 31 at 4:00PM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM WEDNESDAY TO 4 PM PST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations as high as 12 to 18 inches in the Spring Mountains, Sheep Range, and the mountains of southeast Lincoln County. * WHERE...Lincoln County, Sheep Range and Spring Mountains-Red Rock Canyon. * WHEN...From 10 AM Wednesday to 4 PM PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions will make travel very hazardous or impossible. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Lincoln County; Sheep Range; Spring Mountains-Red Rock Canyon
